attributes.action: make a public statement urging Tesco to include the Cross of St George on it's cheese packaging.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tesco sells Scottish Cheese with a Scottish Saltire, Welsh Cheese with the Welsh Flag, Irish Cheese with the Irish tricoleur and yet English Cheese has the Union flag printed on the packaging instead of the cross of St George.
Please Urge the Prime Minster to add his weight to this campaign against blatant anti-English bias

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
